<!-- main text -->

<div  style="max-width: 55rem; float:left;">
Join us for the **Immcantation Users Group Meeting 2020** to learn how researchers are applying the [Immcantation Framework](http://immcantation.org) for high-throughput bulk and single-cell B cell receptor repertoire analysis.
Submit an abstract to present your own research, or simply join us to learn how others are using [Immcantation](http://immcantation.org) to advance knowledge of adaptive immunity.

This virtual users meeting will take place via videoconference on **`r BIG_DAY`, from `r BIG_DAY_TIME`**.
The program consists of seven presentations chosen from submitted abstracts. See [Program](program.html) for details.

Registration is **free** <!-- and will be open until `r REGISTRATION_ENDS`-->. See [Registration](registration.html) for details.
</div>
